scripts.dev: env $(awk 'NF > 0 && !/^#/ { print $0 }' .env.local | xargs) npm run dev -ws --if-present
scripts.local:build: env $(awk 'NF > 0 && !/^#/ { print $0 }' .env.local | xargs) npm run build -w demo-store-core/packages/website
scripts.local:start: env $(awk 'NF > 0 && !/^#/ { print $0 }' .env.local | xargs) npm run start -w demo-store-core/packages/website
scripts.local:serve: env $(awk 'NF > 0 && !/^#/ { print $0 }' .env.local | xargs) npm run local:serve -ws --if-present
scripts.test:data: env $(awk 'NF > 0 && !/^#/ { print $0 }' .env.local | xargs) npm run test:data -ws --if-present
